TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CollectionEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 提供一个用户界面，该界面可以在设计时编辑大多数类型的集合。

span.span: Provides a user interface that can edit most types of collections at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用关联具有属性。The following code example uses an to associate the with a property. [!code-cpp[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

span.para: 此编辑器可编辑的集合属性。编辑器可以确定该集合的类型属性，如果它存在。如果集合不具有此属性，或如果你想要提供多个类型的集合，则可以重写此类的某些受保护的成员，以自定义编辑器来支持其他类型的集合。

This editor can edit collections that have an property. The editor can determine the type of the collection from the property, if it exists. If the collection does not have this property, or if you want to provide collections of more than one type, you can override certain protected members of this class to customize the editor to support other types of collections.

summary.span: 指示是否可以移除集合的初始成员。

span.span: Indicates whether original members of the collection can be removed.

returns.span: 如果允许从集合中移除此值，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if it is permissible to remove this value from the collection; otherwise, .
The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类中实现时，此方法将指示是否可以从集合中移除指定的值。When implemented in a derived class, this method indicates whether the specified value can be removed from the collection. 默认情况下，此方法始终返回`true`。By default, this method always returns `true`. 当用户尝试删除的原始成员的集合的项时调用此方法。This method is called when the user tries to remove an item that is an original member of the collection. 删除当前编辑会话，因为它们不是尚未的集合的一部分中的新增的项时，不调用此方法。This method is not called when removing items that were added in the current editing session because they are not yet part of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法指示是否可以在集合编辑器对话框中选择多个集合成员。This method indicates whether multiple collection members can be selected within the collection editor dialog box.

summary.span: 获取此集合包含的数据类型。

span.span: Gets the data type that this collection contains.

returns.span: 集合中项的数据类型，如果对于该集合未找到 属性，则为 。

span.span: The data type of the items in the collection, or an if no property can be located on the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以检索该集合的项的数据类型属性，它是比此方法更快。You can retrieve the data type of the items of the collection from the property, which is faster than this method. 此方法不需要用户可调用的除非在此方法已重写并实现其中的派生类中。This method does not need to be called by users, except in derived classes where this method has been overridden and implemented. 此方法的默认实现返回的数据类型`Item`集合 （如果存在） 的属性。The default implementation of this method returns the data type of the `Item` property of the collection, if it exists.

span.para: 开发人员可以选择重写此方法以支持不遵循典型受支持的集合模型的集合或性能的关键，和基于反射的类型解析太慢。

Developers can choose to override this method to support collections that do not follow the typical and supported collection model, or when performance is critical, and reflection-based type resolution is too slow.

A new instance of the specified object.

span.para: 如果它无法创建指定类型的新实例，此方法应引发异常。
This method should throw an exception if it cannot create a new instance of the specified type.

summary.span: 获取此集合编辑器可包含的数据类型。

span.span: Gets the data types that this collection editor can contain.

returns.span: 此集合可包含的数据类型数组。

span.span: An array of data types that this collection can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以检索该集合的项的数据类型属性，它是比此方法更快。You can retrieve the data type of the items of the collection from the property, which is faster than this method. 此方法不需要用户可调用的除非在此方法已重写并实现其中的派生类中。This method does not need to be called by users, except in derived classes where this method has been overridden and implemented. 此方法的默认实现返回类型数组中的所有集合项的类型。The default implementation of this method returns the type of all the collection items in a Type array.

span.para: 必须重写此方法以支持的多个类型的集合。此方法的默认实现返回的数据类型集合 （如果存在） 的属性。使用此方法重写的默认实现。

This method must be overridden to support collections with multiple types. The default implementation of this method returns the data type of the property of the collection, if it exists. Use this method to override the default implementation.

summary.span: 在用户按下编辑器对话框中的“帮助”按钮或 F1 键时，获取“帮助”关键字以显示“帮助”主题或主题列表。

span.span: Gets the available types of items that can be created for this collection.
The types of items that can be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示可以添加到集合的数据类型。This property indicates the data types that can be added to the collection. 默认情况下，这将返回一种。By default, this returns a single type of . 如果返回多个类型，该集合编辑器 UI 还提供了如何选择要创建哪些项目类型。If more than one type is returned, the collection editor UI provides a way to choose which item type to create.
